name: A Silent Journey
description:
In a world inhabited by magicians and fantastic creatures called Deria, there is a kingdom where sound has been stolen. To solve it, an old princess who was banished to the outskirts of the castle for trying to learn magic is commissioned to recover them. For that, she must find the 3 magic stones where someone imprisoned the sound.

Explore the world, fight against different enemies, enter dangerous dungeons, collect coins to heal yourself... be the hero and return the sound to your people.
